core.name: The Sahā World
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Team gains 23% Lightning DMG and 13% total DMG.

subskills.name: The Sahā World
subskills.description: Team deals 30.0% more Lightning DMG and 15% bonus Total DMG.

core.name: Combo: Naraka Finisher
core.description:
Tap & hold [ATK] to strike a deadly blow.
Tap & hold [ATK] to consume 100 Zakti and unleash Naraka Finisher.
Naraka Finisher can be unleashed in quick succession, dealing 100% ATK of Lightning DMG against enemies within range.
Naraka Finisher additionally restore 1.4 SP upon each hit.

subskills.name: Yaksha Rush
subskills.description: Each cast of Naraka Finisher boosts Total DMG dealt by Naraka Finisher by 12.0% for 2s, 6 stacks max. Each stack's duration is independent of others'.

subskills.name: Raksha AMP
subskills.description: Naraka Finisher deals 15.0% more Lightning DMG against enemies below 30% HP.

subskills.name: Sura's Retribution
subskills.description: Each hit of Naraka Finisher deals 50.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG.

core.name: Eight Dukkha
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically.
Zakti: Starts at 0 and maxes at 500. Passive regen: 10 per second.

subskills.name: Branded for Hate
subskills.description: Gains 30.0% Total DMG against enemies with Darkbolt Mark.

subskills.name: Undying Love
subskills.description: Auto-triggers before the Valkyrie dies, activating an invincible Blink status and restoring 1.5% HP every 0.5s for 5s. CD: 60s; CD starts when the Blink status ends.

subskills.name: Endless Desire
subskills.description: Each kill by Naraka Finisher recovers 150.0 Zakti.

core.name: Raksha's Rage
core.description:
Raksha's Rage unleashes Rakshamaru's might to dominate the battlefield.
Rakshamaru is summoned to smite enemies within a large AOE before her, dealing 300%+80%+6x30% ATK of AOE Lightning DMG.
Tap [ULT] again within 12s since Rakshamaru's appearance to perform Samsara of Death, dealing 7x120%+7x180% ATK of AOE Lightning DMG, paralyzing enemies for 5s, and inflicting 10 Paralyze Trauma.
Samsara of Death boots Ignore Interrupt and grants 40% Total DMG Reduction for 12s.
CD: 20s. The first activation costs 100 SP, while the second costs 0 SP.

subskills.name: Hungering Wraith
subskills.description: The 1st sequence of Rakshamaru attack enhances Zakti regen rate to 12.0 per 0.1s for 7s.

subskills.name: Tiryag's Impulse
subskills.description: Raksamaru's 1st hit inflicts Conductive on the target, which makes it take 40.0% more Lightning DMG for 12s.

core.name: Raijin's Blink
core.description:
Lightning imbued evasion.
Ultimate Evasion triggers Raijin's Blink.
Raijin's Blink: Creates a Lightning imbued shadow at the starting point; the shadows pulls in enemies and deals 50% ATK of Lightning DMG during its existence, and explodes after 3s to deal 400% ATK of Lightning DMG, triggering a global Time Fracture that lasts 3s.
Once Raijin's Blink is triggered, Darkbolt Jonin enters Blink status for 5s, during which she stays invisible and can sprint; while sprinting, her Jonin Finisher can be cast by tapping [ATK] to deal 6x50% ATK of AOE Lightning DMG. Jonin Finisher restores 60 Zakti energy and has an extra 3 SP upon hit.
CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Fusuikami's Bliss
subskills.description: Raijin's Blink's CD is reduced by 4.0s.

subskills.name: Narukami's Curse
subskills.description: Raijin's Blink explosion deals 30.0% more Lighting DMG. Jonin Finisher deals 40.0% more Lightning DMG.

subskills.name: Wakaikami's Vigor
subskills.description: Raijin's Blink restores 100 Zakti energy when procced.

core.name: Garyu Stance
core.description:
Melee moves that incorporate both kenjustsu and taijutsu.
1st Sequence: 50% ATK of Physical DMG + 40% ATK of Lightning DMG. Restores 30 Zakti energy upon hit.
2nd Sequence: 70% ATK of Physical DMG + 130% ATK of Lightning DMG. Restores 40 Zakti energy upon hit.
3rd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG + 160% ATK of Lightning DMG. Restores 60 Zakti energy upon hit and an extra 3 SP upon hit.
4th Sequence: 130% ATK of Physical DMG + 200% ATK of Lightning DMG. Restores 70 Zakti energy upon hit and an extra 5.5 SP upon hit.

subskills.name: Electrified Razor
subskills.description: During Basic ATK SEQ 3 & 4, Valkyrie has higher Ignore Interrupt and takes 40.0% less Total DMG. Last hit of Basic ATK SEQ 4 paralyzes enemies for 5s and inflicts 5 Paralyze Trauma.

subskills.name: QTE: Shiden Blast
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is ignited to deal 700.0% ATK of AoE Lightning DMG, paralyze enemies for 5s, and inflict 5 Paralyze Trauma.

core.name: Darkbolt Pursuit
core.description:
Tap [ATK] when a light circle appears on the character to strike enemies with lethal kunai.
Darkbolt Pursuit: Cast kunai to deal 4x20% ATK of AOE Lightning DMG and inflict Darkbolt Marks (lasts 30s) upon hit.
QTE & the 1st sequence of Rakshamaru attacks can also inflict Darkbolt Marks.
Inflicting Darkbolt Marks on a marked enemy again resets its duration.
Immediately after unleashing Darkbolt Pursuit, tap [ATK] to connect Jonin Finisher, or hold [ATK] to connect Naraka Finisher.

subskills.name: Biting Ember
subskills.description: After unleashing Darkbolt Pursuit, the Valkyrie gains 20.0% Total DMG for 30s. Triggering this effect again to reset the duration.

subskills.name: Lingering Light
subskills.description: Naraka Finisher gains expanded range and faster ATK Speed. Each Naraka Finisher summons a lightning bolt that additionally deals 220.0% ATK of Lightning DMG.

subskills.name: Jonin's Lantern
subskills.description: Zakti starts at 400 and maxes at 600.
